http://arxiv.org/abs/1001.2865v1.author: Robert L. Oldershaw
http://arxiv.org/abs/1001.2865v1.summary:
The paradigmatic transition from a small finite universe to an infinite
unbounded fractal cosmos is briefly put into historical context and discussed.
http://arxiv.org/abs/1001.2865v1.title: An Infinite Fractal Cosmos

http://arxiv.org/abs/astro-ph/9606061v1.author: C. Petit
http://arxiv.org/abs/astro-ph/9606061v1.summary:
After having cross-identified a subsample of LEDA galaxies in the COSMOS
database, we defined the best relations to convert COSMOS parameters
(coordinates, position angle, diameter, axis ratio and apparent magnitude) into
RC3 system used in the LEDA database. Tiny secondary effects can be tested:
distance to plate cenetrs effect and air-mass effect. The converted COSMOS
parameters are used to add missing parameters on LEDA galaxies.
  Key words: galaxies - catalogue - photometry
http://arxiv.org/abs/astro-ph/9606061v1.title:
Reduction of the COSMOS Southern Sky galaxy survey data to the RC3
  standard system
